section.title: Welcome to The MyFaces Project
section.p: This is the official homepage of the first free open source JavaServer(tm) Faces implementation called "MyFaces".

section.title: What is JavaServer(tm) Faces?
section.p: JavaServer(tm) Faces is a new and upcoming web application framework that accomplishes the MVC paradigm. It is comparable to the well-known Struts Framework but has features and concepts that are beyond those of Struts. Look at Sun's JavaServer(tm) Page to learn more about the Java Specification Request 127 and to download the specification. They also provide a useful Tutorial there.
